synopsis.text: Red-hot passion for twintails consumes Souji Mitsuka, an otherwise ordinary high school student. His world takes a dramatic turn when extraterrestrial monsters invade Earth, hell-bent on stealing humanity's spiritual energy and hoarding the precious twintails. Partnering with a mysterious woman named Twoearle, Souji transforms into a powerful, pigtailed warrior, Tail Red, to fend off the invading forces. Joined by fellow twintail warriors Aika Tsube and Erina Shindou, Souji must navigate his newfound abilities, protect his friends, and safeguard the twintails he holds dear from the clutches of the monstrous Ultimegil. As the battle for Earth's spiritual energy rages on, Souji's love for twintails will be put to the ultimate test.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
